Articles.Content:
Hey everybody!

My name is Jesterhead (22 from Germany) and i have to confess: I´m addicted to KSP   It´s one of the few games that really keeps me playing.

I bought KSP in Nov 2014 with absolutly no expactations...it just looked kinda cool. After many tries and bazillions of graveyards filled with innocent Kerbals later, i started to understand the basics. Try and error helped me to become the Kerbonaut i am today.

and today:  Thank You!

Thank you for one of the coolest Space-Games! Great job guys!

And Thanks to the unstoppable Modding-Community! You guys are awesome!

 

Check out my newest creations:

KSS:

==KCS== Jester spielt... KerbalSpaceProgram [Mission KTV-A 001]

Minimus and back:

==KCS== Jester spielt... KerbalSpaceProgram [Mission KTV-D Minimus]

 

Cheers and happy crashing

Jester

Hello Jesterhead and welcome to the KSP forums!

There is no doubt to me that KSP is one of the most addictive games ever.  Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!

On 27/06/2016 at 10:43 AM, Jesterhead said:

[snip

I bought KSP in Nov 2014 with absolutly no expactations...it just looked kinda cool. After many tries and bazillions of graveyards filled with innocent Kerbals later, i started to understand the basics. Try and error helped me to become the Kerbonaut i am today.

[snip]

 

...So, you like KSP and you're awesome at it ...now....

Doesn't bring back the bazillions of Kerbals you killed.... now does it? DOES IT!!!! You swine!!!! You murderer.....

All those kerbals so you could..... learn! Dammit man, think of the Kerbals.... you could at least have sent flowers... or given chocolate to the ones left behind...

Oh the humanity....
 

Welcome to the Forums....
